Reviews.Title: “Brillant Location, Great staff. Fantastic all round..”
Reviews.Author: Alex Z
Reviews.Content: excellent hotel location metro doorstep clean spacious linen changed staff friendly helpful breakfast set lovely eat tea coffee served happy polite ladies return rome re book hotel

Reviews.Title: “Weekend in Rome”
Reviews.Author: murphstar
Reviews.Content: hotel laura hotel beside metro stop makes easy rome hotel clean tidy bad breakfast wasnt worth calling breakfast couldnt wait till maid cleaning min serving breakfast washing hands extra €4 day tax told staff arent helpful sake hotel based 4th 5th floors building found hotel hard arrival found hotel night walls paper night lights middle night annoying trying sleep am continue angry loved rome enjoy time hotel laura recommending people stay

Reviews.Title: “A Nice Hotel Ruined by Incredibly Rude Staff”
Reviews.Author: SaintCharlesTim
Reviews.Content: hotel laura literally yards metro stop convenient rome comfortable muchneeded air conditioning fairly priced breakfast worthless bread various types tea coffee drink annoying sometimes wonder hotels bother advertise breakfast real complaint expectation breakfast disappointed dont fooled free breakfast advertised disappointing hotel laura complete total zero rudeness employees friend checked left bags hotel hours collecting therethe hotel fourth floor building rearrange items luggage checked discreet corner street level lobby lobby merely entrance view front door hotel laura employees street immediately yelled mean yelled screaming respect hotel please recall hotel lobby hotel floors understood speaking italian yes speak italian stop shouting answer hotel laura agree disrespect agree business visit rome october stay elsewhere

Reviews.Content: hotel laura situated historical center rome disadvantage located front metro station served bus 62 stops vatican city reach city center 20 minutes metro 15 minutes bus 10 minutes taxi costs 12 euro night tariff neighborhood couple icecream supermarket pastry shop nice cheap stores hotel occupies floors 4 5 building 4person elevator clean feature tv minibar wireless internet offered street view steal internet neighbor breakfast limited orange juce coffee cereals croissants marmelade milk staff helpful laura hotel choice looking cheap quiet convenient fancy hotel rome fantastic city cares hotel

Reviews.Title: “Small place but really cheap.”

Reviews.Content: positive hotel cheap location subway outside door takes 510 min colesseum bus nr 62 leaves bologna 2 min hotel takes straight st peters city hotels closer city expensive perfect stay sleep shower spend day enjoying rome little tourists locals food locals negative hotel bad breakfast dry bread staff service minded people ok
